project.description: An orchestration layer for AI coding assistants (currently Claude Code) that enforces consistency, reliability, and more predictable outputs through a marketplace of domain-specific bundles providing development standards, workflow automation, and plugin-based extensibility.
project.description_reasoning: From README.adoc introduction and bundle structure analysis

default.responsibility: Root module of the Plan Marshall marketplace, coordinating 9 bundles that provide AI coding assistant orchestration. Contains the marketplace manifest, project-level build configuration via pyprojectx, and top-level documentation.
default.responsibility_reasoning: From README.adoc introduction and marketplace.json descriptor
default.purpose_reasoning: Root module containing marketplace manifest and pyprojectx build configuration, no direct sources

marketplace/bundles.description: Contains all 9 production bundles providing domain-specific development standards and automation

test.description: Python pytest test suite for marketplace script verification using pyprojectx wrapper

default.key_dependencies_reasoning: Root module aggregates all bundles and documentation as a marketplace
